criteria: Analysis of Cumulative Impact of Word Choices
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of word meanings, including figurative and connotative.
Struggles to determine the meaning of words and phrases; limited understanding of figurative/connotative meanings.
Identifies basic word meanings but has difficulty with figurative or connotative meanings in context.
Determines the meaning of most words and phrases, including some figurative and connotative meanings, but analysis is superficial.
Accurately determines the meaning of words and phrases, including figurative and connotative meanings; provides a satisfactory analysis of their impact.
Masterfully determines the meaning of words and phrases, including nuanced figurative and connotative meanings; provides insightful analysis of their impact on the text.
Shows no recognition of how word choices impact meaning and tone.
Unable to analyze the cumulative impact of specific word choices on meaning and tone.
Attempts to analyze the cumulative impact of word choices but struggles to connect them to meaning and tone.
Analyzes the cumulative impact of some word choices on meaning and tone, but the connections are not always clear.
Analyzes the cumulative impact of specific word choices on meaning and tone, providing relevant examples from the text.
Provides a compelling and thorough analysis of the cumulative impact of specific word choices on meaning and tone, demonstrating a deep understanding of the text's nuances.
Demonstrates no understanding of how language evokes a sense of time and place or sets a tone.
Struggles to identify how language evokes a sense of time and place or sets a tone.
Identifies basic elements of tone and setting but does not connect them to the language used.
Connects language to tone, time and place with general understanding, analysis is limited.
Analyzes how the language evokes a sense of time and place and/or how it sets a formal or informal tone.
Insightfully analyzes how the language evokes a sense of time and place and how it sets a formal or informal tone, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of the text.
